name: Lemmings Rescue
description:
Can you help rescue these helpless lemmings from plunging to a watery grave? Bounce as many lemmings as you can to safety before you lose too many lives!

QUICK & FUN TO PLAY! Simply move the life raft to bounce the lemmings across the water.

CHALLENGE YOURSELF! How many lemmings can you rescue before you are overrun? Can you beat our 100 Lemming Challenge?

HINT! Earn extra lives by completing winning streaks without letting a single lemming drown.
